Text: Neaman, onu abogu onu Siria, la chʼe̩ne̩ lile eju odu-wñ, i la chenʼojima, ukpe̩ ki Jihofa fʼabo Siria jadu lʼo̩wo̩-wñ. I laño̩ chʼagbiti ki de̩ kpa-ka, i muda chʼe̩ne̩ o̩ga ikpemute.
Oñ abo Siria ledufu udala udala e̩gba le̩ me̩, ma la fʼimo̩to̩ onobule̩ kekeleʼka mu kwʼane̩ Israe̩l wa; owñ la dʼo̩wo̩ o̩ya Neaman.
Oñ i ka ñw odu-wñ onobule̩ kakini, O odu-mi, ma dʼugbo akache̩ kʼi de̩ Samaria, i ma fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ chekpa.
Taku Neaman nyʼejefu, oñ i ka ñw odu-wñ kakini, Abe̩i, abe̩i oñ imo̩to̩ onobule̩ kʼi kwʼane̩ Israe̩l ka-i.
Tak onu Siria kakini, Lo, kʼu nadʼo̩takada kpʼuche̩ rʼonu Israe̩l.
Tak i mʼo̩takada le̩ du wa ñw onu Israe̩l, o̩takada le̩ kakini, E̩gba kʼo̩takada-i lewʼugbo we̩, go, u fu Neaman, o̩ma-mi, kpe̩ wʼugbo we̩, kʼuwe̩ ki fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ che.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼonu Israe̩l fʼo̩kalatu o̩takada le̩ che, i fʼukpo-wñ fana, oñ i kakini, Omi chʼO̩jo̩? ku nakpʼone̩ kʼu nadabi dʼu daji? tak e̩ne̩-i akpʼone̩ wʼugbo mi kʼu fʼo̩ga ikpemute-wñ chekpa? Nagbo̩ko̩bʼume̩, me̩ dibetʼo̩ ku me̩ li alu kʼi atene aida-mi.

Oñ i lewatu e̩gba kʼE̩laisha, e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, gbo̩ ka kʼonu Israe̩l fʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ fana, i fʼuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo onu kakini, E̩wñ chi kʼe̩ fʼe̩wñ o̩la-we̩ fana? Je̩ ñw u wʼugbo mi, tak i ama ka kʼakache̩ dʼIsrae̩l.
Abe̩le̩ Neaman lewa kpai amanya-wñ kpai o̩kogu o̩kogu-wñ, oñ i kwodago alugbana unyi E̩laisha.
Tak E̩laisha fʼonuche̩ kpe̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kakini, Lo, kʼe̩ gwo̩la ef aji Jo̩rdan onu mebie, tak o̩re̩la-we̩ adabiwa ñw e̩ oñ o̩la-we̩ afe̩.

Neaman muda we̩do̩, i la kwʼo̩mo̩ le, i kakini, Omi do̩ kʼi adufu wʼugbo mi tila, kʼi dago akwadʼodu Jihofa O̩jo̩-wñ, kʼi la adʼo̩wo̩ che fe̩fe̩fe̩le̩ lale oji ugbo kʼo̩ga-mi de̩ kʼi la fʼo̩ga ikpemute-i chekpa.
Abana kpai Farpar, aji Damaskus le̩, nyo̩ tʼomi Israe̩l du le n? I nʼugbo kʼu nagwʼo̩la ef e-le̩ kʼo̩la-mi afe̩ n? Tak i murida ke̩do̩fulu alo.

Tak abuko̩lo̩-wñ te̩me̩rʼu, oñ ma ko̩la ñw u kakini, Ata-mi, iche̩wñ kʼakache̩ le̩ ma ka ñw e̩ kʼe̩ che e̩wñ lileʼka, uwe̩ ma che n? I chʼe-i me̩ tule nana n? Abu kʼi ka ñw e̩ kakini, Fʼo̩la gwe̩ kʼe̩ fe̩ n?
Tak i gwo̩ru nyʼo̩mo̩ oñ i dʼo̩la-wñ tunyu Jo̩rdan onu mebie, alu kʼe̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩ ka; tak o̩re̩la-wñ mudabi dabe̩ne̩ kʼo̩re̩la imo̩to̩ okolobia, oñ o̩la-wñ fe̩.

Tak i mudabi tʼugbo e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, owñ kpai abo-wñ chaka, oñ i lewa dago o̩gba-wñ; tak i kakini, E̩ go ta, u chema ka kʼO̩jo̩ du dʼile̩-i n chai oj ane̩ Israe̩l. Todule̩ nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ gba e̩wñ eleʼka kwʼo̩wo̩ adu-we̩-i fai.
Ama i kakini, Oji Jihofa e-kʼu dago o̩gba-wñ-i, nagbʼe-du n. Oñ i kutʼo̩ kʼi gba; i muda ko̩.

Taku Neaman kakini, E̩ ma chaka je̩ abe̩le̩ n, nagbo̩ko̩bʼe̩ kʼe̩ je̩ ñwu ma bʼane̩ oj adu imiulu meji ñw adu-we̩-i todu akwʼe̩gba-i adu-we̩-i akʼe̩wñ iche̩bo̩ e̩gujo abe̩k e̩wñ iche̩bo̩ du ñw amo̩jo̩ omune̩ n, chai Jihofa nako ñw u.

Ef e̩wñ-i Jihofa ki du ba ñw adu-we̩-i: e̩gba kʼodu-mi anyʼef unyi Rimo̩n kʼi dojikane̩ o̩mo̩, kʼi alo̩ nʼo̩wo̩-mi, kʼu la adojikane̩ ef unyi Rimo̩n e̩gba kʼu nadojikane̩ ef unyi Rimo̩n le̩, Jihofa ki dʼe-le̩ ba ñw adu-we̩-i.
Tak i ka ñw u kakini, Lo kpai ure̩do̩.
Ama Ge̩hezai, imo̩to̩ E̩laisha e̩ne̩ O̩jo̩ le̩, kakini, Go, odu-mi bʼo̩wo̩ lo̩ ñwu Neaman e̩ne̩ Siria le̩, abu kʼi ma gba e̩wñ kʼi ne̩ wa te̩ o̩wo̩-wñ n. Oji Jihofa nara nʼo, kʼu nagbʼe̩wñ ugbo-wñ.
Abe̩le̩ Ge̩hezai rano Neaman. Tak e̩gba ki Neaman li ka kʼe̩ne̩ʼka afule tʼo̩ ubi, i mudachi tane̩ bʼef o̩kogu-wñ te̩ kʼi ledʼo, oñ i kakini, O̩lafia i che?

Tak i ka ñw u kakini, O̩lafia i che. Odu-mi kpe̩ mi wa kakini, Go, faifai abokolobia meji ku ma chʼamo̩ma amakache̩ kwʼoj ane̩ uwo e-Ifraim wʼugbo mi; agba, e̩ mʼitale̩nt ajifaʼka du ñwu ma, kpai e̩wñ o̩la anyimuda meji ge̩.

Taku Neaman kakini, I ki nyʼuwe̩ eju kʼe̩ gbʼitale̩nt meji. Oñ i kutʼo̩, tak i mʼajifa itale̩nt meji ji nyʼakpulu meji, manyʼe̩wñ o̩la anyimuda meji, oñ i mʼu ko nʼamadu-wñ meji ika; tak ama nʼe̩ tʼo̩gba-wñ alo̩.
Oñ e̩gba kʼi lewa e̩re̩ uwo, i mʼu gba bʼuma o̩wo̩ te̩, oñ i mʼu ko jʼef unyi; tak i je̩ ñw aboke̩le̩ le̩ mudabi le, oñ ma le ma.
Owñ muda le tʼejefu adago o̩gba odu-wñ. Tak E̩laisha ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo, Ge̩hezai? Oñ i kakini, Imo̩to̩-we̩-i nyʼugbo du n.

Tak i ka ñw u kakini, E̩do̩-mi lebʼuwe̩ e̩gba kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ murida bʼo̩kogu-wñ te̩ aledʼuwe̩ n? Iko ku ma agba o̩ko̩ de̩? Iko ku ma agba e̩wñ o̩la kpʼuche̩ o̩lif kpʼuche̩ achiwebe̩te̩ma, kpʼame̩wño̩re̩ egini kpʼamokuno̩ kpʼamadu aboke̩le̩ kpʼamadu abobule̩ le̩ de̩?
Todule̩ ikpemute Neaman le̩ amanyʼuwe̩ o̩la, kpai ugbe̩-we̩ ogbegbele̩. Tak i mud e̩ne̩ o̩ga ikpemute efufu dabu sno kwʼo̩gba-wñ le.
